name: Lucidya Ltd
description: Developer of a customer experience management platform designed to help organizations make improved strategic decisions. The company's platform uses a spatial data search engine to analyze both current and historical social media content in real-time using the contents published on different channels, enabling businesses to leverage consumers' feedback and expand their reach to target customers.
one_liner: Developer of a customer experience management platform designed to help organizations make improved strategic decisions. The company's platform uses a spatial data search engine to analyze both current and historical social media content in real-time using the contents published on different channels, enabling businesses to leverage consumers' feedback and expand their reach to target customers.
